about_the_game:
A Battle Girls basic text guide.

Thid DLC contains a very basic text file, that details the main routes through the game.
N.b. it doesn't include all routes or achievements, this is meant as a basic guide to the basic routes of the game only.
detailed_description:
A Battle Girls basic text guide.

Thid DLC contains a very basic text file, that details the main routes through the game.
N.b. it doesn't include all routes or achievements, this is meant as a basic guide to the basic routes of the game only.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Graphics: PDF viewer
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version Leopard 10.5.8 or later
  • Graphics: PDF viewer
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

name: Battle Girls - Guide

short_description: A Battle Girls guide to the main good ends and secret routes of the game.
